function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Improve accessibility to jobs and healthcare, address housing inequality, and provide alternative transportation options","category":"Social circulation space, ventilation, and daylighting conditions to pandemic resilience","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Developing compact cities with well-mixed
